Spider fact for Ini! Some spiders are picky eaters! They'll actually free inedible insects!
Spider fact for Ini! Did you know that wolf spiders carry their young on their backs? So if you see an even spidery-er spider, it's probably a wolf spider.
Spider fact for Ini! Spiders serve as totems for all kinds of cultures! They're industrious, clever, and powerful! Way more suitable thank snakes, thank you, Harry Potter.
Spider fact for Ini! Spiders can be super ambitious! Some species will actually use their webs like trampolines and catch insects mid-air!
Spider fact for Ini! Spiders have really good senses! They can feel vibrations with their hairs, but they have super compounded eyes too! Spiders can have up to 8, but some have 4 or 6 eyes!
Spider fact for Ini! Bagheera kiplingi is a vegetarian spider-- mostly! They eat primarily roots and leaf decay!
Spider fact for Ini! A brown recluse is actually really shy! But if you upset them, their bites can kill. Just like shy girls with glasses !
Spider fact for Ini! Jumping spiders can leap 40 times their own body length. Can you imagine an athlete jumping almost 100 meters?

I’ll hold onto it for another round but… I guess it’s lucky for the rest of my other clothes… red like a sacrifice, maybe…?
Ehehe~ you’ve got a lot more insight than I’d have guessed, Akko-senpai~ But how's this for a mystic gesture?
Amy-- ehehe~ S-sorry, I’m just a little… I didn’t expect, um, ooops…
Ehehe~, how do you know I’m not tricking you~?
It's kind of hard to read what you're writing while I undress but... I think a whole world of experiences is hidden behind a little discomfort.
Flattery won't get you everywhere... but it'll definitely get you under my blazer, Sayaka-chan~
Uh-huh, Sayaka. I do really like spiders!
...I don't really have one. Every boy I date ends up finding something about me too weird, like how I play with my ribbon...
...I'm not a witch! This is about the only magic trick I know--
I don't know and-- oops... That was a little more than I meant to take off...
I'd honestly be a little impressed becuase you'd be stealing a fantasy... that's some next-level plundering!
Yeah... you don't find my singing annoying?
I do like the idea of not having to aim... my vision's not the best...
Well... weird intro, but sure! We're kind of skipping the get to know each other part, and going to the 'cool being naked in front of each other' part, aren't we?
Hm~ Hm~ Hm~ ...What was that, Yunyun? Sorry, I was busy focusing on my shoes...
...I tend to fidget with this ribbon a lot but... uh... are you... mocking me...? I though we were going to be friends...
To celebrate a magical friendship, watch this magic trick, Yunyun!
Oh... oh shoot... Um... Yunyun?

Well... my hair's pretty thick and red everywhere... so I thought I'd style it a bit... and really, Yunyun? I do have the hair for it... I could always marry into it, if this friendship goes really well...!
That's right, Galatea! ...I hardly think this is the usual way you'd be... performing, though, right?
I think that's kind of the point of poetry though, right? It's using words to describe an experience, not necessarily an experience unto itself. It's like what I said earlier...
It's like with my ribbon... if it were spidersilk, I'd have a whole bunch of spider stories and spider facts to say... but as it stands, it's just a way for me to vent my distractions...
You know, me too, Galatea. I think I just can't keep my thoughts straight, so the best way to deal with them is to let them fly freely, even if they go in too many directions.
...Um... I think that's just... um... wait, hold on...
Just have fun! Seriously. The point of art is to be fun, isn't it? If all you do is make people feel worse, or your goal is to trick them, that's dumb.

Even if it is porn, at least most of the characters here are nice. I think... it's like layers of an onion. You know you stand on one layer, you can look up and see another, but you know that there have to be more.
Thank you, Galatea. I'm glad I'm not alone in here. And I'm glad you're okay with being yourself. As for me, I like to show myself off in cute little ways... like this!
You know, Yuri, would you like it better or worse if I covered up? It's so hard to tell what you're thinking sometimes!

I think even though Lovecraft was a horrible racist, you can still worry away at something that's still an interesting challenge, right? It doesn't do a whole lot for me to play with my ribbon... but it's still something that interests me, right?
S-so, you know, it's a bit like you find someone attractive, and they make you feel good, and then when you stop feeling as good with them, you go your separate ways, I guess, Yuri?
I think the idea that we're a metaphorical computer crash away from non-existence is pretty interesting. It just makes you want to do everything you can to love the life you're given, you know?
That's always a great idea, Yuri. I really love that the Literature Club gives us so much more to do.
It was something like... everything around you is just off by a little bit. Like, the people you know don't recognize you, reality's not quite what you expect...
...I hear a lot of backhanded compliments. So... I'd like to think I'm pretty even with my braids.

It was with that boy I knew from band. He was always so nice to me, then he graduated when we were going into our sophomore year.
We didn't really date but... he was over at my place, and one thing led to another.
Monika'd probably have your eye whether you wanted it or not... that girl's more of an apex predator than she lets on, you know?
I'm sure you've noticed, but Monika's like a big old bird-eating spider. She'll hunt you down and eat you alive!
Natsuki's so cute, right? But I bet she'd make a big show of being embarrassed, but that's how she gets you in!
I bet Natsuki'd be doing that effortlessly sweet thing she does. Some spiders do that too, like tarantulas. They're all fluffy and cuddly until they're stringing you up!
Sayori's a Theridion grallator, you know, the happy face spider! She's harmless. Well, maybe to everyone but herself. I think she wants and feels bad for wanting sometimes...
Sayori's so happy and bubbly! ...But I... I worry about her a lot. I think she'd be happy someone liked her body, but still somehow be upset over it.
Yuri's like a goliath spider. And I don't just mean because of her big boobs. Well, I do, but she just can lunge and crush you with personality, right?
Yuri's kind of like a trapdoor spider. She builds this elaborate web but then just springs on you! Fun, right?
...I guess if you're used to giant spiders... But aren't they so cool? Even if they're weird and threatening, you can still love them, you know!
You could call me "ADAmy..."
You could just call me "the weird spider girl..."
I have to take off my clothes? How awful...
So... do you ever think I'll get to try out different outfits for this?
...This ribbon's actually really important to me. Have you heard of how red strings are supposed to tie soulmates together?
You know, I'd like to say I practiced this a bunch...
Hm. Let's hope nothing weird happens this playthrough, huh, ~player~?
I'll be honest. I've masturbated a lot in my socks. My feet just get really cold, and it's hard to get in the mood--

Well... it's not terribly exciting, but the first part of a poem shouldn't be, right?
Hm... oh, it's me? Wait, where was I? Um... Okay, something liiike... my blazer will do it, right?
So... I did an upper piece, let's do... shoes!
I'm going to keep my ribbon a bit longer. But... I'm a shoe-in. Get it?

I really like this ribbon, but if I'm being honest, it's about my sixth. They always fray, so...
I don't think I matched my underwear, anyway, so...
How embarrassing would it be if I didn't wear underwear? Pretty bare-assed. Em. Anyway--!
Um... sorry, I'm just... I know it's my turn but...
Dang it, what am I... oh, shoot.

Socks to be me about now...
So... I thought "Well, I have red hair, and so it'd be cute if I made a little heart!"
I was in the shower and thought "Hey, what if I tried a shape?" I wanted to do an hourglass, you know, spiders, but then I was like "Oh no! I forgot the oven!" So I stopped at a heart.

N-no... not like... not in front of her. Phew. Y-yeah... I'm... I'm fine, Natsuki. I just need to rest.
Do you... have one of those protein bars?
N-no... not like... not in front of her. Sigh. I'm sorry, Riri... just... got a little over-excited... um... give me a minute, okay?
N-no... not like... not in front of her. Sigh. I guess we all have our... um... defects, huh, Yuri?

I hear it! I hear it!
{ddlc}What is that melody!? {!reset}
It's okay.
I'm okay. {ddlc}I can hear it! I can hear all of it!{!reset}
I'm here.
I'm just Amy.
I'm {ddlc}me.{!reset}
And nobody else is me.
I'm me. I'm Amy.
Why don't you take a good, hard look.
Why don't you take a hot, wet look?
Hm...? I'm going to hold onto the ribbon a little longer... but if you want to know about spiders, I can definitely tell you, Ini!

I'm not so sure about that, Miko. I'm a pretty tough metafictional entity, even if I can't do stuff like Monika. Plus, I'm mostly here for the banter. I can see pretty much anything on the internet. Or in person.

...Oral's valid as far as sex goes... ribbon... twisting under my fingers... tongues... ohoho~...
I think we can all enjoy cute girls doing cute things. Hm?

...It hurts my feelings when you call me a dirty tramp. Whatever I am, Miko-sama, I'm not unclean. (Even if I don't mind being dirty...)

Probably somewhere between eep and a-ah~ if you want to try, Ku~mat~o~ra~
I'm glad you two are both so impressed~ But... ~player~, don't you think it'd be more fun if I hooked up with Kumatora...?

Horror is fun and all, but does everything need a deeper meaning? Like, Monika doesn't have some secret sin she's just hiding behind that ever-so-perfect facade... She's just little miss perfect who'd never kill her friends for kicks!
Compliments will get you pretty far. But they'll also get you into a position I certainly could teach you a thing or two in~
Aww, you're avoiding answering the question! But I hope you'll-- wait, what were we doing? Shoot.
~player~, I know a few things, and I know when jokes are mean and jokes are jokes and jokes are just what people tell themselves~... I think I'm more of a show than a tell, though...

Come on, you don't need to pretend like you don't... Yeah! It's to help me focus, Natsuki...!
...If I did hurt my tongue, you know it'd be really hard to kiss it better-- or just use on someone once we're both naked. Or not both naked.

...~player~, choose wisely. And this is Strip Poker. And you know who's better at stuff. Don't you, ~player~?

Well... thanks. I'm not sure I really need to talk about it. I never get to talk to anyone at home when I come home, anyway, and this is a lot like coming home.
♫ Da ti la... ti la di do re ti la... ♫

And now I'm thinking about hitting on a much younger girl...
I'm sorry for being such a mess--!
...Having a more intimate conversation? I've never been seduced by a much older woman, but...
...Can't characters in a story just be normal and happy? Especially if they're hurting for a very human reason? Horror is fun and all, but does everything need a deeper meaning?
Aww, don't be that way, Meia. I'm just used to getting picked on. But I could really use some advice, if you're giving it.
Hm… I suppose if I was going to try some magic mushrooms, we’d make a good pair for it.
...Though, I'm certain ~player~ wouldn't mind being toyed around with... what do you think, Riri?
I bet ~player~ takes a lot less time to recharge than a magic wand... and can be taught a lot better... look how quick he picked up poetry.

state.text: She tries so hard, but it's hard to be friends with a girl who wants so badly to be saved, but… honestly can get a little oppressive.
Plus, it’s hilarious to upstage people.

...But I think, in a place like this, we can get along pretty well. It's a bit like facing your ideas but not needing to own them as much as inspire them, I guess?
If we make her life hard, doesn't she feel more sympathetic? Are we pushing her to be more of the archetype she's supposed to be, or are we delivering for her fans by being harsh?
At least in the Literature Club, I can explore new versions of myself, right? We're all just a series of personas, after all.

case.state:
Imagine knowing you only know because your flaw, your {ddlc}otherness{!reset} made them forget about you.
The monster cheerily killed my friends. And I'm the only one who remembered it because {ddlc}she forgot I existed.{!reset}

state.text: I really do respect her. I'm like a magnet that sticks to the biggest… biggest other magnet. She's more like a candle, slowly burning away. It's hard to be a light when you're burning yourself...
...Though I'm more like a bat! I can hear the melodies of the strings and spheres, but… Monika sees them. She can play them like a piano. I just recognize the music.

Mostly I worry that people will love my friends for who they are, but people just… put up with me. I know some people in my life really do love me. But, I always worry I'm an idea that's wrong or bad and that I have to stop being myself to be actually happy… Sorry, I kind of rambled there…
...Hm... would I be written with enough witticism to actually be satirical, I wonder? Or am I just here to shitpost?

Honestly, collaborations are the most fun part of an art project, even though I can be all over the place. ♪ But all these pieces and parts of me / Could be something much larger than me / Some day~ ♪

If I were a real real person, I'd probably be a lot different too, right? There's no reason I can't have fun on my terms. Both for what I'm made to do and what I'm going to do. Psst, that's probably you, ~player~~
I'm a nightmare girl for a nightmare world~ ♪

case.state: --And don't badmouth my friends! They're people, not some weird mental health case study. Respect them, or I will go full spork on you, Streaming-chan!

...That's weird. I always thought of it like being a worm who can view an apple from the outside, rather than just chewing his way through it...

Know yourself, and you'll win every battle, I think~ And what's wrong with any of that stuff, Streaming-chan?

Ehehe~... I'm just Amy, in all my spinny, shiny webs~

Someone tonight to make a deep, stretchy impression on me. Ehehe~

I read this one quote that "freedom is the space between the bars and nothing more." So I think, even if you don't always have a choice, you can make the choices you have something which makes you happy... or something like that.

Oh-- oh! It's like with music! Melody is the space between the notes. So... if you have a lot of experience left to make, you can make whatever you want out of poems. Who really cares what someone writes, anyway? All that matters is how it makes you feel.

Oh, shoot. I got distracted thinking about my ribbon, Galatea... I think... I guess you have to give away your little secrets as a woman so you can keep the big ones the real secrets. If people find oil, they won't mine you for gold... unless you matter a lot.
It's nice to distract someone with my brain and not my body. Though, they're both sort of nice, right?
Shoot... um... yeah... sometimes I do feel a little detached... like, there's this song, or this... hollowness that I can't quite describe, and I just... block it out with nonsense...

You're Galatea, obviously. And you're whatever you decide to be. Think of it like... being an idea made manifest. The more cogent you are, the more accurate you have to become before you can let your author rest.

I guess... if you're crazy, you'll try to engage with the layer above you. But if you aren't, you just have fun with the other people like you, whether they're aware or not. And compliments are very fun.

And the courage to stand against someone who'd take it away. I can't imagine someone so alien who'd just go around ruining people's lives... sorry, was I talking about my ribbon or something? Or did you want to talk about horror?

If it helps, I'd totally keep socks on and give someone a footjob. Can't say I'd be amazing, but just want to be helpful!
